categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic organizations

nodes.text: The Rebel Alliance Corps of Engineers, or simply the Alliance Corps of Engineers, was an organization within the Alliance to Restore the Republic that specialized in engineering and construction. Around 1 ABY, the Rebel Alliance Corps of Engineers began constructing Echo Base on the ice planet of Hoth—a project that would take two and a half years to complete. Major Kem Monnon served in the Corps.
